Two months passed, and the bump in Vanilla's belly grew steadily larger. Seeing as how it was his child growing in her womb Tails moved in with Vanilla and Cream, bringing many of his machines and tools with him to create a brand new lab. Vanilla allowed him to sleep in the same bed, sometimes with Cream accompanying them. Many nights were spent cuddling together for warmth underneath the bed-sheets... among other things. Given that Tails was still a child despite his great intellect, Vanilla could not reveal to their friends who the father was, which might lead to harsh judgement and repercussions, and also to questions as to how the baby was conceived.

Over that same time-span Rouge the bat had mysteriously gone missing. The Sonic crew wasn't really worried about it at first because of her treasure hunting tendencies, but it was unusual for her to be gone this long without contacting anyone.

Tails worked on his shrinking machine near constantly, refitting it for a larger amount of passengers and greater comfort, fine tuning both software and hardware to make them far more efficient, and adding a few new features such as the ability to teleport out of danger and improved navigational systems. He tireless work had given him a lot of time to think, and he slowly grew more accustomed to Vanilla's strange tastes, even coming to enjoy them.
He still didn't know how he felt in involving Cream in their adventures but she was exposed to too much and it was far too late to turn back now. Somehow through it all she managed to keep her playful innocence, even through things that no young bunny should ever have to see. Sometimes Tails wished he could give up some of his own intelligence and go back to being that blissful.

Tails was putting the finishing touches on the machine when he heard someone come into the lab and speak.
"Tail's, honey, that machine can wait until tomorrow. Please come to bed. I was getting lonely."
Tails turned to see a tired Vanilla standing in the doorway then turned back to the machine.
"Just need to make a few more adjustments,and I'll be ready to hit the hay."

Vanilla pouted. "You know, you spend far too much time on that thing. We haven't been together in over a week, and the hormones have been affecting me a lot lately. I think you need to take a break for a little while and relax. The machine's not going to go anywhere for a few days and you need the rest."

Vanilla walked up to the young fox and placed a hand on his shoulder. "I'm not going to have to drag you out of here, am I?"

Tails sighed, then pur down his tools. "You're right. A little vacation wouldn't hurt anything. I'll come to bed."
Vanilla patted him on the head and said, "Good boy.", then gently led him out holding his hand in hers.

She knew this was instinctual, but she continued to do it out of free will to soothe herself as well. She noticed that she began to pur while rubbing her belly, but didn't mind. Her purring became loud, loud enough to be heard if someone was with her in the room. This soothing of herself and presumably her new child continued for a long time, until she felt Tails kick. This only further satisfied her, she even began to coo as she felt his little kicks from inside of her.

         She was soon happy, even if this was Tail's end in a way, this filled her with joy. Though she wasn't planning for a child until she married a noble, Tails would make an excellent heir. Even if his former self was lost like she believed, she would raise him as an intelligent mobian again, even if she wasn't as smart as he was. After some time talking with her doctor about some specifics, she calmly left to go home and finish her other responsibilities for the day. She knew she would have to inform her friends about Tails eventually, but since she didn't have another meeting planned with Cream and Vanilla until next month, she kept to herself and to her little "passenger" til then.

         She dreaded how they would react, but nevertheless the time had come to tell them the news. Her first stop was obviously Cream's home. On her way there she noticed actual missing person signs for Tails, which again incurred her guilt, but she carried on anyways. As she approached her friend's house she saw quite a few missing signs on their house's walls, noticeably more frequent then anywhere else. She took a big sigh before knocking on the door. Vanilla answered rather happily seeing her again, but she seemed a little off put. As she let her in she called for Cream, which in less then a minute appeared at her side. Cream was jumping with joy that her friend had returned and abruptly hugged her. Cream immediately noticed that Blaze was a little more... plump then when she last met her and she made it apparent. To which Blaze, putting on a happy expression to hide her guilt for now, told them she was pregnant.

         The two rabbits were in awe, though Cream didn't really know much about this subject, she still knew enough to be excited. Her mother on the other hand simply smiled and looked at Blaze in a certain way, as to say she sympathized with her and was happy at the same time. After some settling in, their conversation eventually reached the topic of Tails. Vanilla unknowingly informed Blaze that Tails hasn't been seen for almost a month and that everyone was worried about him; especially Sonic. As she said that Blaze became anxious, anxious enough that it was clearly visible.

         Vanilla asked her if something was wrong to which Blaze nodded. She took a gulp before telling them Tails was gone, but most likely not in the way they thought. Vanilla dropped her utensil as she heard that, she broke her usually calm and polite character in surprise. She didn't think Blaze knew Tails was missing let alone his whereabouts. She reluctantly asked if Blaze knew what happened to him, and once again she nodded.

         She finally spat out that Tails was... the reason she's pregnant. Tails somehow got small enough to fit inside her at a rather inconvenient time, resulting in what must of been one of her eggs absorbing him. And now that some time has passed, he was now "her's". She tried explaining that by the time she figured this out she couldn't remove him without killing him, but Vanilla's look didn't change. Blaze looked down and said she was sorry, that there's nothing she can do. Vanilla simply stood up and walked over to her without a word.

         Blaze braced herself for whatever her reaction would be, but she wasn't prepared for a hand on her shoulder. She looked up at Vanilla, she seemed to understand and didn't show any signs of malice or regret. She simply patted Blaze's shoulder and told her it was okay, that it wasn't her fault. She said that she would miss Tails, but to look on the bright side, Tails now had a caring mother. Blaze couldn't find a word to respond with considering all the emotions she was now feeling. She barely stuttered out; ' y-you really t-think that? ', Vanilla told her she did, that anyone would be lucky to be her child, and that's not just because of what they might inherit. That certainly added to it, but her inner self was the real prize; and that Tails probably did that because he wanted her to be his mother.

         Blaze suddenly got up and hugged Vanilla while saying; ' thank you '. Vanilla embraced her with open arms and let her pour her emotions out. After everything calmed down Vanilla said that they should tell the others of this wonderful news. Blaze agreed and they relayed it to all of Tails friends. They all had different reactions to the bitter-sweet announcement, but they all seemed to agree that this wasn't particularly bad; that if anything she should be proud of what she's done. She's finally given him the loving parent he's never had, and someone to make sure he's never alone again.

         eventually the time came for his (re)birth, and everyone close to him and Blaze was there to witness it.

************

15213211121111.content:
Tails immediately remembered what had happened and was scared. He tried crawling away but the doctor with her picked him up, cut his cord, and said he was a boy before handing him to Blaze. He tried to use his tails but he couldn't hover, his other tail was gone, and the remaining one was similar to Blaze's. He couldn't escape now, so he curled up in a ball and just hoped she wouldn't kill him. He soon heard her voice greet him and welcome him back.

         He tried to adjust his eyes to see her but he heard another familiar voice; ' hey buddy ', to which he almost instinctively responded; ' S-Sonic? '. He heard the room fill with gasps, before Blaze gawked; ' Tails, your memory... '. He quickly started apologizing and begged for her not to hurt him, she lovingly responded; ' I wouldn't hurt you Tails, besides, you needed a mother right? '. Despite her hospitality towards him he still feared her, he didn't understand that the tone she just used was that of affection, not sarcasm or something else. He felt her hands suddenly warm up and move him closer to her, which caused him to panic and cry out for Sonic. He then felt himself pushed up against her fur and heard her say he was okay, and that she's happy to be his mother.

         He knew exactly what she meant by that and couldn't believe it, those words couldn't of come from her mouth; right? He abruptly felt tired again, he tried to ask Blaze something but he was interrupted by one of her fingers starting to pet him. He was again surprised as he started to pur, each stroke of her finger made him calmer and started making him fall asleep faster. He tried telling Blaze to stop so he could clear some things up, but the only sound he was able to produce was a weak murmur before he fell asleep in her arms...

He quickly ran over to the rubble hoping to salvage something. Ironically, the only thing still intact was the data he previously collected on her.
